name: Slide Soccer - Play online!
description:
Over 5 million people from 135 countries have already tried the magic of Slide Soccer! With simple gameplay, different playing surfaces, balls and great physics, Slide Soccer is one of the most fun soccer games ever.

Have a ball playing soccer on your mobile device with Slide Soccer. Play online against people from all over the world. You can also play with your friends in the same device or play offline against a very challenging AI.

--------------------------------------------

Slide Soccer gives players the ultimate mobile soccer experience.

KEY FEATURES:
• Fun gameplay and amazing physics
• Discover multiplayer on Slide Soccer by challenging friends and players around the world.
• Offline mode against a very challenging AI.
• Play the world championship with different teams.
• Choose between various levels of difficulty and different playing surfaces like grass, ice, or dirt to test your skills on slow or slippery fields.
• Take shots with precision and ease. Have that mastered? Add impact!
• Choose a ball for each scenario (worn leather, golf ball, rugby ball, or a special ball for ice) to optimize your strategy.

DON'T WAIT ANY LONGER! Start scoring goals in Slide Soccer!

May the best player win!

Feedback? Questions? Contact us! slidesoccer@ludei.com
